title: Which universities have the best graduate programs in branding and design? - Quora

response.answer_text: TU Delft in The Netherlands has an excellent programme in Strategic Product design, which combines product design and marketing / branding. I studied there for half a year as an exchange student and can highly recommend it.
Top schools for marketing are: US News Best Colleges  Top schools in the world for design are: The World's 25 Best Design Schools*
